channel.title: Problem Solving on Datumorphism
channel.description: Recent content in Problem Solving on Datumorphism

item.title: SCQ-A
item.description: SCQ-A SCQ-A: Situation + Conflict + Question + Answer SCA-A is a framework for problem solving. Situation: background knowledge, set the stage Complications: what is happening Question: propose your hypothesis Answer: accept or reject the hypothesis

item.title: WWH
item.description: WWH WWH: What (happened) + Why (this happened) + How (to improve)
